bibl.title: Villages and Patronage in Fourth-Century Egypt = The Case of P. Ross. Georg. 3.8. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: A reinterpretation of P. Ross.-Georg. III, 8. - 1. The text. - 2. Places and papyri. - 3. Master and patron. - 4. Village and villagers. - 5. Taking liberties.
RATHBONE Dominic, Villages and Patronage in Fourth-Century Egypt = The Case of P. Ross. Georg. 3.8. Avec résumé en anglais.
